DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess safety profile brentuximab vedotin combination multi-agent chemotherapy treatment-naive Stage IIa IIb-IV Hodgkin lymphoma . It phase 1 , two-arm , open-label dose escalation study design define maximum tolerate dose , pharmacokinetics , immunogenicity anti-tumor activity brentuximab vedotin combination frontline therapy .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase 1 Study Brentuximab Vedotin Combined With Multi-Agent Chemotherapy Hodgkin Lymphoma
